title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.47 - Transcript of judgment; receipt stub
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 202.47 - Transcript of judgment; receipt stub

State Regulations

Whenever a county clerk issues a transcript of
judgment, which shall be in the form prescribed by law, such clerk shall at the
same time issue a stub. Such stub shall be 35/8 x 81/2 inches and shall have
imprinted thereon the name and address of the issuing county clerk. The stub
shall also contain such other information as shall be required to identify it
with the transcript with which it was issued, so that it may be readily
identified upon its return to the issuing county clerk, with the name of, and
the date of receipt by, the receiving clerk endorsed thereon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
202.47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
